title: So this new assassin update.... really riot.
body:
Riot again showing their love for their favorite champion. {{champion:238}} . 
So Ad assassins now have 3 assassin items. TWO OF THEM NOW HAVE MR. SO NOW ZED CAN SPELL SHIELD YOUR ONLY POSSIBLE DEFENSE MOVE! Even if  you manage to do some damage to him he still has good old {{item:3156}}  to save his pathetic ass.

In all seriousness riot why the hell would you do an assassin update on AP assassins when they clearly dont exist. No AP assasin itemization available in the game. Meanwhile you give ad assassins a COMPLETE counter to any "spell" in the game. {{item:3814}} . Even if you cant actually activate the active (tounge twister) it still gives magic resist which litterally fucks mages in the ass unless you have void staff. 

Litterally I wouldnt have cared if you gave ad assassins 10 fucking items, You retards at riot office CONSISTANTLY FUCK AP CHAMPIONS EVERY PATCH. 

Perfect example 
{{item:1041}}  gets a buff
{{item:1039}}  does not

That is a no brainer Riot but yet again you dropped the ball.

replies.body: Nevermind that Akali was made less bursty and less assassin-y and she was one of the strongest AP assassins in the game.
The strongest AP assassin in the game had a 1.7% pick rate and below-average winrate, BEFORE THE GUTTING. That says a lot about the state of AP assassins.
they completely ignored the fact that {{champion:28}} exists.  {{champion:28}} and {{champion:35}} are the original assassins the game.

Yep! Because she was countered by Pinks and had no escape unless she could juke the stuns 'n shit to get a dash off to an out-of-position champ or a minion. But they've given her immunity to that reveal shit, AT THE COST OF HER PLAYABILITY. Lmao.

Hunter's Talisman is still pretty good.  It's more of a 'do I single target damage or multitarget'.  Basically, if you are a champion that can buy Talisman first, you can do Raptors, if not.............. well I would avoid raptors.
fine but {{item:1041}} still got a buff that {{item:1039}} didnt
{{item:1039}} didn't need a buff whatsoever.
neither did {{item:1041}}

A lot of people actually felt {{item:1041}} was very weak in comparison.  The health regen from it via lifesteal was not that great.  the extra damage was similar to {{item:1039}}, but {{item:1039}}also gave you a LOT of mana.  Especially since {{item:1039}} did so much extra if you could do any aoe what so ever and didn't even need mana.

{{item:1041}} is good on melee champions with attack speed because it will proc more. Certain champions now DOMINATE the jungle because of this. This has been a known fact for quite a while now. This buff to {{item:1041}} makes champions like {{champion:39}} able to jungle well. Although this may seem like not a big deal it kind of is. This 5 extra damage per auto attack could change the meta once we figure out who has the highest attack speed. I'm already seeing lee sin and master yi easily out farming me in the jungle. {{item:1039}}  remains consistant for every champion ever because the damage never changes.
Talisman was being taken on none AP or even mana champions because it's passive was easy to abuse.
